comment: The Möbius function takes on values in magnitude at most ` 1 ` . (Together with ~ mucl , this implies that it takes a value in ` { -u 1 , 0 , 1 } ` for every positive integer.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
